text_block_list.text:
After I finish up my duties one day, I<n>come across Fuji
Kiseki speaking<n>with one of her young dormmates.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
This is strange. Why did you call me<n>out here to this
deserted place?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: What's going on, my dear pony?

text_block_list.name: Junior Student
text_block_list.text: Well, um, Fuji...

text_block_list.name: Junior Student
text_block_list.text: Today I'm ready. I want to tell you<n>how I feel.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: ...Very well. I'm ready to listen. My<n>heart is open.

text_block_list.name: Junior Student
text_block_list.text: Fuji, you... you mean the world to me!

text_block_list.name: Junior Student
text_block_list.text:
You've always been there, just a<n>year ahead of me, a goal
for me to<n>chase and maybe one day even catch<n>up to...
And when I did...

text_block_list.name: Junior Student
text_block_list.text: We'd be shoulder to shoulder,running as equals... running together.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: My dear, p—

text_block_list.name: Junior Student
text_block_list.text: So... it's just so hard... that I...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Now, now. Look at me.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I heard from the director about this<n>being your last day at
the academy...<n>and about your injury.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Even among the students here, you<n>were gifted with a
remarkable talent. I<n>knew you would become a<n>formidable
opponent one day.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
You were unwavering in your training,<n>practicing harder than
all others.<n>That's why it pains me to see you go.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I've always been a fan of yours.

text_block_list.name: Junior Student
text_block_list.text: I don't know what to say...

text_block_list.name: Junior Student
text_block_list.text:
I wanted so badly to keep running... to<n>keep winning, and
then one day...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: One day?

text_block_list.name: Junior Student
text_block_list.text:
I know this is a big ask, but I want<n>you to carry on my
dream. My dream<n>as a racer...

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Of course, I'll hold it with me always.<n>It'll be like we're
running together,<n>forever and ever.

As the sun sets, a faint crying can be<n>heard, until finally, the
young racer<n>leaves with a smile on her face.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Well, it appears you've stumbled<n>upon my secret. I know
you're there,<n>Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
There come times like that when a<n>precious student must
leave the<n>academy. It makes me feel so<n>helpless, unable
to change anything.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
How can I bring joy to someone<n>whose dream was
shattered? Even<n>her parting smile was filled with<n>
sadness.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: She entrusted her dreams as a racer<n>to me...

Just now, I'm reminded that Fuji<n>Kiseki told me she once
let go of her<n>dream to be on the big stage,<n>choosing
instead to become a racer...
choice_data_list: Hey, what's your dream? I mean now.
Hey, what's your dream? I mean now.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Mine? My dream is crystal clear—it's<n>to bring joy to all and
make miracles<n>happen.

As soon as the words leave her lips,<n>she falls silent. With a
curious<n>expression, she looks deep in<n>thought.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Oh my, I seem to have lost myself.<n>Fuji Kiseki would put on
a big smile<n>precisely at this moment!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
I ask that you promise me you'll<n>keep secret what you saw
here today.<n>It'll be just between you and me, all<n>right?

Clandestine promise made, Fuji<n>Kiseki gives the biggest
smile she can<n>muster.
